title: Defining y-intercept
text: The y-intercept of a parabola is where it intersects the y-axis.

title: Identifying y-intercept visually
text: From the graph, the y-intercept is the coordinate point where the graph crosses the vertical y-axis.

title: X-value of y-intercept
text: Since the y-intercept is where the graph crosses the y-axis, the x-coordinate of the y-intercept is $$0$$.
